mapper.select: select cm.*, c.name as clubName, s.name as studentName from club_member cm left join club c on cm.club_id = c.id left join student s on cm.student_id = s.id where cm.club_id = #{clubId} order by cm.join_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into club_member(club_id, student_id, role, join_time) values(#{clubId}, #{studentId}, #{role}, #{joinTime})
mapper.update: update club_member set role = #{role} where id = #{id}
